description: Follow the powerline across the road. Watch for the sign at the Hut (veer left) and just follow the flagging tape to the top.Great summer and fall hike, about 400 metres in elevation.
directions: Take the upper levels highway to the Cypress Bowl cutoff, and head to the top.  Instead of going to the downhill lot, you turn right at the sign for the cross country, and park for $3 a day.
title: HollyBurn from the Cross Country Parking Lot
